languages.text: "Это становится похоже на азартное соревнование, а не на тренировку — но хорошо, действуйте".
languages.translation_comment: через затемнение убираем старые мишени, ставим блюстителя с бутылкой на голове
через затемнение убираем старые мишени, ставим блюстителя с бутылкой на голове

languages.text: "This is beginning to feel more like a gambling competition than a training session — but, very well, proceed."
languages.original_text: "Это становится похоже на азартное соревнование, а не на тренировку — но хорошо, действуйте".

traits.locale_text: "This is beginning to feel more like a gambling competition than a training session — but, very well, proceed."
"This is beginning to feel more like a gambling competition than a training session — but, very well, proceed."
"This is beginning to feel more like a gambling competition than a training session — but, very well, proceed."
"This is beginning to feel more like a gambling competition than a training session — but, very well, proceed."
"This is beginning to feel more like a gambling competition than a training session — but, very well, proceed."

languages.text: 「訓練というよりギャンブルの勝負になってきた気がしますが…まあいいです。続けましょう」
languages.original_text: "This is beginning to feel more like a gambling competition than a training session — but, very well, proceed."

traits.locale_text: 「訓練というよりギャンブルの勝負になってきた気がしますが…まあいいです。続けましょう」

languages.text: "Bu yaptığımız, eğitim seansından çok iddia yarışmasına dönmeye başladı. Yine de kabul."
languages.original_text: "This is beginning to feel more like a gambling competition than a training session — but, very well, proceed."

traits.locale_text: "Bu yaptığımız, eğitim seansından çok iddia yarışmasına dönmeye başladı. Yine de kabul."

languages.text: «Esto empieza a asemejarse más a una serie de apuestas que a una sesión de entrenamiento... pero de acuerdo, adelante».
languages.original_text: "This is beginning to feel more like a gambling competition than a training session — but, very well, proceed."

traits.locale_text: «Esto empieza a asemejarse más a una serie de apuestas que a una sesión de entrenamiento... pero de acuerdo, adelante».

languages.text: “这已经不太像是训练了，更像是打赌。不过，没问题，就这么办吧。”
languages.original_text: "This is beginning to feel more like a gambling competition than a training session — but, very well, proceed."

traits.locale_text: “这已经不太像是训练了，更像是打赌。不过，没问题，就这么办吧。”

languages.text: « Voilà qui s'apparente davantage à un jeu de hasard qu'à une séance d'entraînement, mais... entendu, allez-y. »
languages.original_text: "This is beginning to feel more like a gambling competition than a training session — but, very well, proceed."

traits.locale_text: « Voilà qui s'apparente davantage à un jeu de hasard qu'à une séance d'entraînement, mais... entendu, allez-y. »

languages.text: "Das Ganze fühlt sich langsam eher wie ein Spiel an, nicht wie eine Trainingseinheit ... aber gut, fahrt fort."
languages.original_text: "This is beginning to feel more like a gambling competition than a training session — but, very well, proceed."

traits.locale_text: "Das Ganze fühlt sich langsam eher wie ein Spiel an, nicht wie eine Trainingseinheit ... aber gut, fahrt fort."
